channel.title: [Hyperion] Revision #508!
channel.description:
[b][u]Hyperion #508 information![/u][/b] Downloaded Hyperion and converted it to 508, lolwut. [b][u]Credits[/u][/b] [ul][li]Graham <3 - For Hyperion; the greatest base ever released.[/li] [li]Scu11 <3 - obvious reasons are obvious.[/li] [li]Mystic Flow' <3 - Trololol[/li][/ul] [b][u][i]Features![/i][/u][/b] [ul][li]All the features that were built into the original Hyperion release..[/li] [li]Grahams event manager[/li] [li]Full, 100% completed #508 cache data[/li] [li]Friends and Ignore list.[/li] [li]NPC rendering.[/li] [li]Multiplater, multiplayer chat, multiplater combat, etc..[/li][/ul] [b][i][u]Additional information[/u][/i][/b] Hyperion #508 is a huge project. It will indeed be released to the community, as the people of these forums need a GOOD server in the download(s) section. Anyways, this is not something that will be done in just a few days. I need an incentive to finishing the server, so if you support be sure to add a little message showing you support, when you comment. Regards, Drew. [b]--We have encountered many updates; please refer below, to read up on all the NEW features..--[/b] No need to be alarmed! The base has not been changed. After spending 3 horrific hours converting Hyperion into the #508 source, I realized it was not all I had planned it to be. My plan is to now, re-write every packet and add in Grahams event manager ASAP. I have finished most of the major core features in a framework, and I am quite satisfied with the results. Below, you can find a list of said features: [ul][li]Character rendering <3[/li] [li]Item spawning, and equipment manager <3[/li] [li]NPC rendering <3[/li] [li]Login (hurr) <3[/li] [li]Multiplayer <3 <3[/li] [li]Chat, and Private Chat![/li] [li]Packets (skills tab, quest tab, etc..)[/li][/ul] I spent about 6-hours coding these, and as stated before, I'm more than satisfied with the results. I also removed a shit load of features pre-coded into Hyperion, as they were not created to my liking. I apologize to all those Hardcore Hyperion fans, I feel like the server could be made better without a shit load of common issues fixe(s) removed. I've started working on a basic 508 IP changer. I've packed only and all #508 data (no #503 shit..). Refer below for some pictures that I have recently taken. Below is an "Update Log".
-Update Log!- *I've added almost 100+ NPC's around the RS World.. Correct placements, as real Runescape. *Started some Combat shit.. Starting at magic, than building up from there! *NPC combat, and Player Vs. Player combat is completed! *Eating is added. *Different potions; completed! *Added a lot of other small things for PVP.. Look for your self! * Jewelry, and some commands, are used for an alternative to spawning a shit load of portals..
[b]--MEDIA!--[/b] [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Capture_089.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Capture_090.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Capture_093.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Capture_091.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Capture_092.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Capture_094.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Capture_095.jpg[/img] More to be posted soon.. Yours Truly, Drew. EDIT: TROLOLOL; I couldn't think of a message to put in the "Message of the week", so I put a random one in.. The "Holds 2,000 Players", has YET to be tested. Don't believe everything you read ;)

item.title: [Hyperion] Revision #508!
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:15, topic:388376”][quote author=Python_ link=topic=484199.msg3550049#msg3550049 date=1301440897]

nice job you should release a blank version for people who want blank :P(not me currently on 317 hyperion for nostalgia)

Nooo. If people want this blank, they will just have to delete everything I have added into the source. The release of this server, will NOT be coming with anything that you normally need to run a server. The users will need to use an IDE, and learn to get the look and feel of this server. This is far from ordinary
[/quote]

im just saying if i downloded a hyperion server i would like to customize it not leech oh well this is moparscape so leeching is what they like to do[/quote]

Well, my friend Mike who was supposed to be helping me - irl friend - with the server, bailed out on me. So, I’m probably going to release the files I have coded especially for the server, and if people know how to cache convert, they can paste them into their own Hyperion #508, or another #508 server. As I do now know much about the 500+ protocols, I feel as I am not the correct person who should be coding this. Ahh, I’ll sleep in the idea, and maybe will have an answer in the morning.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] Revision #508!
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=484199.msg3549963#msg3549963 date=1301438615]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=484199.msg3549950#msg3549950 date=1301438342]

• Packets (skills tab, quest tab, etc…)
[/quote]Aren’t they the same packet?

No. All Client -> Server and Server -> Client packets change every revision.
[/quote]I wasn’t questioning the change from revision. I was questioning whether the ‘skills tab’ and ‘quest tab’ are the same packets or not. I may have misread it, or misunderstood it, but from what I got out of it, he was saying “one packet for this tab” and “one packet for the other.” I have grown to believe they would both be handled in the clicking packet, correct me if I’m wrong.[/quote]

Aaah, no sir you are correct. I mis typed, I ment it to be packets, plural for all the packet(s)… So basically the simple fix:
Packet Handling (Quest tab, friends, skills)

Read full topic

No. All Client -> Server and Server -> Client packets change every revision.

I may have misread it, or misunderstood it, but from what I got out of it, he was saying “one packet for this tab” and “one packet for the other.” I have grown to believe they would both be handled in the clicking packet, correct me if I’m wrong.[/quote]

My bad. I misinterpreted what you said haha :P. Might have something to do with it being late and me being tired :(.

item.title: [Hyperion] Revision #508!
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

Hyperion #508 information!
Downloaded Hyperion and converted it to 508, lolwut.

Credits

[ul][li]Graham <3 - For Hyperion; the greatest base ever released.[/li]
[li]Scu11 <3 - obvious reasons are obvious.[/li]
[li]Mystic Flow’ <3 - Trololol[/li][/ul]

Features!

[ul][li]All the features that were built into the original Hyperion release…[/li]
[li]Grahams event manager[/li]
[li]Full, 100% completed #508 cache data[/li]
[li]Friends and Ignore list.[/li]
[li]NPC rendering.[/li]
[li]Multiplater, multiplayer chat, multiplater combat, etc…[/li][/ul]

Additional information
Hyperion #508 is a huge project. It will indeed be released to the community, as the people of these forums need a GOOD server in the download(s) section. Anyways, this is not something that will be done in just a few days. I need an incentive to finishing the server, so if you support be sure to add a little message showing you support, when you comment.

Regards,
Drew.

–We have encountered many updates; please refer below, to read up on all the NEW features…–
No need to be alarmed! The base has not been changed. After spending 3 horrific hours converting Hyperion into the #508 source, I realized it was not all I had planned it to be. My plan is to now, re-write every packet and add in Grahams event manager ASAP. I have finished most of the major core features in a framework, and I am quite satisfied with the results. Below, you can find a list of said features:

[ul][li]Character rendering <3[/li]
[li]Item spawning, and equipment manager <3[/li]
[li]NPC rendering <3[/li]
[li]Login (hurr) <3[/li]
[li]Multiplayer <3 <3[/li]
[li]Chat, and Private Chat![/li]
[li]Packets (skills tab, quest tab, etc…)[/li][/ul]

I spent about 6-hours coding these, and as stated before, I’m more than satisfied with the results. I also removed a shit load of features pre-coded into Hyperion, as they were not created to my liking. I apologize to all those Hardcore Hyperion fans, I feel like the server could be made better without a shit load of common issues fixe(s) removed. I’ve started working on a basic 508 IP changer. I’ve packed only and all #508 data (no #503 shit…). Refer below for some pictures that I have recently taken. Below is an “Update Log”.

-Update Log!- *I've added almost 100+ NPC's around the RS World.. Correct placements, as real Runescape. *Started some Combat shit.. Starting at magic, than building up from there! *NPC combat, and Player Vs. Player combat is completed! *Eating is added. *Different potions; completed! *Added a lot of other small things for PVP.. Look for your self! * Jewelry, and some commands, are used for an alternative to spawning a shit load of portals..

–MEDIA!–






More to be posted soon…
Yours Truly,
Drew.
EDIT: TROLOLOL; I couldn’t think of a message to put in the “Message of the week”, so I put a random one in… The “Holds 2,000 Players”, has YET to be tested. Don’t believe everything you read

Read full topic
